venue.name: New Britain Museum of American Art

item.description:
New Britain Museum Of America Art's First Friday
5:30 - 8:00
$10.00 admission and $5.00 for members.
Always a great time!!!

Junior Krauss & the Shakes
Playing classic and contemporary blues, jump and swing for listening and dancing pleasure. The band has been established since 1999. Junior Krauss & The Shakes are the winners of 2005 CT Blues Society’s Blues Challenge and 2009 CTBS Best Self-Produced CD.
Doug “Junior” Krauss on Harmonica/Vocal
Andy Mac Donald on Guitar/Vocal
Ben Boylan on Upright Bass
Bob Bequillard on Drums

Dance Lessons with swing and cha cha.

and of course the amazing museum itself, with it's very impressive collection!!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby at 5:30, I will wear my bw Scarf with piano keys, check out all pics of those attending to hook up
item.name: New Britain Museum Of American Arts - First Friday
